title: Toy Block, ""Build the Town"", 1941
creditline: Gift of Radoslav L. and Elaine F. Sutnar
description: Six-sided block: two square faces painted turquoise blue; two opposite rectangular sides painted orange with two white rectangles painted lengthwise across center of each; two opposite rectangular sides painted white with one blue rectangle flanked by two blue squares painted lengthwise across center of each.

tombstone.epitaph:
Toy Block, ""Build the Town"", 1941.
1941. Painted wood. Gift of Radoslav L. and Elaine F. Sutnar. 2000-76-1-4.
